name: Community & Cultural Events
description: From lively festivals and art exhibitions to informative workshops and performances, we hold a diverse calendar of events that cater to all ages and interests. We also welcome other Italian organizations across the Bay Area into the historic Casa Fugazi to host gatherings.
fullDescription: From lively festivals and art exhibitions to informative workshops and performances, we hold a diverse calendar of events that cater to all ages and interests. We also welcome other Italian organizations across the Bay Area into the historic Casa Fugazi to host gatherings.
whatTheyOffer: From lively festivals and art exhibitions to informative workshops and performances, we hold a diverse calendar of events that cater to all ages and interests. We also welcome other Italian organizations across the Bay Area into the historic Casa Fugazi to host gatherings.
howToGetIt: Call their office or find more ways to contact them here - https://www.italiancs.com/contact-us/
